name: A Fable Tale
description:
Embark on the fantastical journey of Theo, the magical mink, and Roo, the trickster crow, as they venture into the land of mysterious creatures called the Fabled Ones.

Second semester exam project, developed by Team Monctopus:

  • Lead Designer: @smsanderz (LinkedIn)
  • Narrative Designer: @rebeccaveggerby (LinkedIn)
  • Art Director: @Louxie
  • Level Designer, Programmer: (LinkedIn)
  • Programmer: (LinkedIn)
  • Producer, Programmer: @JPDConstantino
  • Audio Designer, Composer: @L3mon
